rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and open to the courtyard.
Adjacent to living room, providing space for meals with a view of the courtyard.
Modern kitchen designed for efficient ventilation and natural light through skylights.
Private guest room with window placements optimizing light and airflow.
Central corridor connecting rooms while allowing natural ventilation.

openings.description: Provides access to the central courtyard for enhanced air circulation.
Large window designed for optimal natural light and ventilation.
Ensures natural lighting in the kitchen while promoting airflow.
